history.proof: intro a. unfold is_gcd. split. - split. + apply divides_refl. + srun best use: divides_refl. - intros d' H. destruct H as [Hcd Hd]. sfirstorder depth: 3.

original: intro a. unfold is_gcd. split. - split. + apply gcd_refl. + intros d' H. unfold divides in H. destruct H as [q Hq]. rewrite Hq. apply divides_refl. - intros d' H. destruct H as [Hcd Hd]. apply gcd_unique with (d:=1); auto.
